title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Dec 31 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 - Dec 31 2021
description:
EIB Guest Host Michael Berry, "The Czar of Talk" from NewsRadio 740 KTRH in Houston, welcomed more of your Open Line Friday calls as 2021 ticked down to midnight. Someone will have to round out Kamala's rough edges. Suddenly Fauci makes a distinction between being in the hospital "with" and "because of" covid. How Rush stood up to cancel culture, declared he hoped Obama's policies failed. El Rushbo had a historic connection to this audience, and it was a lot for Clay & Buck to pick up the torch and they hit home runs every day. Bravo! Meeting and exceeding expectations every day.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
